meta.content: Owasso Public Schools serves students PreK-12th Grade and is located in Owasso, OK.

div.div: Distance Learning will begin on Monday, April 6 for students of Owasso Public Schools. Please review this introduction to Distance Learning from OPS Assistant Superintendent Dr. Margaret Coates.
Owasso Public Schools is offering complimentary meals for all children aged 18 and under during the mandatory statewide school closure.
The health and safety of our students is always our top priority. Check the link above for ALL UPDATES from Owasso Public Schools regarding COVID-19. PLEASE CHECK FREQUENTLY FOR UPDATES.

On Wednesday, March 25th, the State Board of Education approved a recommendation that all schools in Oklahoma remain closed and that the school year will be completed at home. Although the learning would look different from what your students experienced before spring break, our district will commit to deliver instruction to your students through a variety of methods.

Calendars for the upcoming 2020-21 & 2021-22 school years are available now. Links to current and future school calendars can be found under the "District" and "Parents" tabs on our homepage. On our School Calendars page, you'll find easily accessible PDF versions of the calendars to download and print along with a link to our events calendar, which you can subscribe to and automatically access calendars using iCal, Google Calendar and more.
Location: Owasso Public Schools, 1501 N Ash St, Owasso, OK 74055, USA
Location: Oral Roberts University, 7777 S Lewis Ave, Tulsa, OK 74171, USA
